title: Stolen Accounts/Missunderstandings
body:
Hey, guys this is a discussion about stolen accounts and mussjudjment by Riot (nothing personal) . So i wanna tell you my story, Here i go 
My accounts was stollen once ,but i wrote to Riot and the actually helped me , but i dont know how happend again but someone had stollen it again ,
so i wrote to Riot Again over and over (like 7-8) times but they didnt want to help me . So thats my case . You can share your thouthts here . Bye

replies.body:
How strange. Maybe they changed the programming of the bots since then.

What exactly did they reply to you with?
